title: My New Bed Frame Is From Amazon—And I Love It
description: Here are 15 of the e-internet’s best to shop right now.
excerpt: I ﻿parsed through more than 30 pages of styles and read hundreds of interviews to curate the very best bed frames on Amazon﻿, including one that I own for myself.
text: Rich Leather Sandy Wilson Home Marlowe Platform Bed SetProsLuxury lookUnbeatable valueConsMixed reviews on sturdiness Might be difficult to assembleIf you’re looking for an easy way to upgrade your aesthetic, consider playing around with textures. Assuming you don’t have a leather duvet, this bed frame will create a gorgeous juxtaposition contrasted with your soft bedding. I love it!”Upholstered Frame Meridian Furniture Sloan Collection Velvet Upholstered BedWhat this bed lacks in Amazon reviews, it makes up for in beauty. The minimalist design can easily work with any other decor elements, and the timeless aesthetic can be cherished for years and years to come.Colors: Brown, Cream, Saddle, Camel Sizes: Twin, Full, Queen, King Customer review: “Very happy with my purchase. Looks super fancy!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRattan Paneling Walker Edison Inaya Solid Wood Rattan Panel Bed FrameYou could easily fool me into believing this is from a high-end furniture store. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowShop More From ELLE The 10 Best Reclining Sofas That Actually Look ChicWe Prepped 50 Cool Halloween Costumes for YouHow to Score Last-Minute Tickets to Taylor Swift’s Eras TourYou Won’t Believe These Chic Boots Are on AmazonHere Are the Greatest Fall Candles of All TimeMeg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
html:
Rich Leather

Sandy Wilson Home Marlowe Platform Bed Set

Pros
  • Luxury look
  • Unbeatable value
Cons
  • Mixed reviews on sturdiness
  • Might be difficult to assemble

If you’re looking for an easy way to upgrade your aesthetic, consider playing around with textures. Assuming you don’t have a leather duvet, this bed frame will create a gorgeous juxtaposition contrasted with your soft bedding.

Colors: 6 options

Sizes: Queen, King, California King

Customer review: “I think this is one of the best beds out there. They thought of everything. I love it!”

Upholstered Frame

Meridian Furniture Sloan Collection Velvet Upholstered Bed

What this bed lacks in Amazon reviews, it makes up for in beauty. The minimalist design can easily work with any other decor elements, and the timeless aesthetic can be cherished for years and years to come.

Colors: Brown, Cream, Saddle, Camel

Sizes: Twin, Full, Queen, King

Customer review: “Very happy with my purchase. I had seen the same style for more than double the price—decided to bet on this Amazon one and could not be happier. Looks super fancy!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rattan Paneling

Walker Edison Inaya Solid Wood Rattan Panel Bed Frame

You could easily fool me into believing this is from a high-end furniture store.

Colors: Black, Natural

Sizes: Queen, King

Rounded Headboard

Mr. Kate Moon Upholstered Low-Profile Storage Platform Bed

Cons
  • Mixed reviews on drawer stability

The half-circle headboard looks incredibly posh on this style from Mr. Kate’s own home line.

Colors: Blush, Light Grey

Sizes: Queen, King

Customer review: “I am so happy with this purchase. I put the entire bed together myself, it was very easy to follow the directions. The drawers are great, and the bed is sturdy. I love it! It’s so elegant.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame

Pros
  • Several size, color, and height options
  • Amazon’s Choice
  • Rave reviews
  • Solid wood
Cons
  • No head or footboard
  • Mixed reviews on the included screws

I’ve had this bed frame, as have several of my friends—and it’s unanimously loved by all. And that price can’t be beat.

Colors: 7 options

Sizes: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Customer review: “The quality is outstanding—it’s incredibly sturdy and feels well made. I was worried about the assembly process, but it was surprisingly easy. The frame provides excellent support, and it also offers plenty of clearance underneath for storage. Overall, this bed frame is a fantastic value for the price. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, durable, and stylish frame!”

Mattress Brand

Nectar Bed Frame & Headboard

Pros
  • Extremely easy to assemble
Cons

    Who could be more expert at building bed frames than a mattress company? It just makes sense! Bundle your own bed set from Nectar directly on Amazon.

    Colors: Grey, Linen

    Sizes: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

    Customer review: “Price/value is excellent. I’m glad other reviewers lead me here.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Sleigh Style

    Modway Luella Upholstered Sled Platform Bed

    Cons
    • Might be difficult to assemble
    • Sits low
    • One size and color option

    Stylistically, this is my favorite one. The oat-toned upholstered headboard and sleek dark wood base make for a very chic combination.

    Colors: Walnut Beige

    Sizes: Queen

    Customer review: “The bed is beautiful solid wood; it feels sturdy and high-quality—exactly as it looks on the Amazon listing. Still so in love!”

    Bouclé Texture

    Furniture of America Vivienne Modern Bouclé Platform Bed Frame

    Pros
      Cons
      • One size and color option

      Customization is key, and this frame is available with a variety of headboard iterations. From curved to wingback, pick what suits your preferences best.

      Colors: White

      Sizes: Queen

      Customer review: “This checked all the boxes for me AND at a fabulous price. I am definitely happy with this purchase and can justify that it is worth it.”

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Pop of Color

      Jennifer Taylor Home Roman Curved Platform Bed Frame

      Pros
        Cons
        • Might be difficult to assemble

        I’ve suffered from the affliction of sad beige decorating more than a time or two, so this rich green hue caught my eye immediately.

        Colors: Ebony Black, Ivory White, Olive Green

        Sizes: Queen, King

        Customer review: “It took us about two hours to assemble, but all the parts were there, and it looks amazing. Very sturdy—we love it!”

        Low Sitting

        Baxton Studio Maya Bed

        Cons
        • Only available in one size and color
        • Sits low

        It isn’t ideal that this one only comes in a Queen size... but that’s literally this frame’s sole downfall. The sculptural curves will add a museum-worthy presence in any bedroom.

        Colors: White

        Sizes: Queen

        Customer review: “The fabric is thick and very good quality. It was easy to assemble. I love that it’s pretty and sturdy.”

        Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

        Classic Black

        Sha Cerlin Metal Platform Bed Frame with Wooden Headboard and Footboard

        Cons
        • Mixed reviews on stability

        A footboard is an underrated element when it comes to interiors. It requires a bit more care when making the bed, but as a trade-off, you’ll never have to worry about tucking your sheets neatly under the mattress.

        Colors: Black Oak, Mahogany, Walnut

        Sizes: Full, Queen, King

        Customer review: “Super easy to put together. This bed looks very stylish and is very sturdy. Excellent value for the price!”

        Luxe Velvet

        Allewie Velvet Bed Frame

        Pros
        • Several color options
        Cons
        • Mixed reviews on squeakiness

        Why limit softness to just the sheets when your whole damn bed could be swathed in velvet?

        Colors: 7 options

        Sizes: Full, Queen, King

        Customer review: “I had low expectations, but I was pleasantly surprised! It was super easy to put together. It feels VERY sturdy and soft. The height is perfect. After looking through a million different options, I really feel like this frame was a GREAT choice.”

        Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

        Dark Wood

        Zinus Raymond Wood Platform Bed Frame with Adjustable Wood Headboard

        Pros
        • Easy to assemble
        • Timeless style
        • Real wood
        Cons
        • Only available in one color
        • Mixed reviews on height and headboard height
        • Mixed reviews on creaking noises

        You can’t go wrong with a solid wood panel. No frills, no fuss, just a good piece of furniture.

        Colors: Brown

        Sizes: Twin, Full, Queen, King

        Customer review: “Great bed! Style is simple, and materials are high quality. The value for the price is excellent. This should last me well into the future, and I would point any friend towards this bed if they were looking.”

        Quilted Headboard

        Meridian Furniture Deco Collection Contemporary Bed Frame

        Pros
          Cons
          • One size and color option
          • No customer reviews

          If you like the look of a cloud bed, you just might love this fuzzy mod style, which adds visual interest to the average off-white frame.

          Colors: Cream

          Sizes: Full

          Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

          Stained Wood

          Bme Vivian Deluxe Bed Frame with Headboard

          Pros
          • Real wood
          • Easy to assemble
          • Doesn’t squeak
          Cons
          • Only available in one size and color
          • Customers report the included screws are too short

          There was a time when it was frowned upon to mix wood types, but not anymore.

          Colors: Rustic Golden Brown

          Sizes: King

          Customer review: “This bed really is an amazing value for the money. It was easy to put together, directions were clear, and there really weren’t all that many parts. It’s real wood, and it is stunning.”

          Why Trust ELLE

          Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.

          Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

          Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
